items.name: ResourceLoader
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: ResourceLoader
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class ResourceLoader
    ###*
    * The resource helps to load a bunch of resources from different kind of
    * data structures.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class ResourceLoader
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    * @static
    ###
    constructor: ->
        @loadedScenesByUid = {}
        @loadedCommonEventsById = []
    
    ###*
    * Loads all graphics for the specified list of custom layout types/templates
    *
    * @method loadUiTypesGraphics
    * @param {Object[]} types - An array of custom layout types/templates
    * @static
    ### 
    loadUiTypesGraphics: (types) ->
        for k of types
            @loadUiLayoutGraphics(types[k])
                        
        return null
    
    ###*
    * Loads all graphics for the specified layout-descriptor.
    *
    * @method loadUiGraphicsFromObject
    * @param {Object} layout - The layout descriptor.
    * @static
    ### 
    loadUiGraphicsFromObject: (layout) ->
        for k of layout
            if k == "image" or k == "fullImage"
                ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{layout[k]}")
            else if k == "video"
                ResourceManager.getVideo("Movies/#{layout[k]}")        
        return null
    
    ###*
    * Loads all graphics for the specified layout-descriptor.
    *
    * @method loadUiDataFieldsGraphics
    * @param {Object} layout - The layout descriptor.
    * @static
    ###     
    loadUiDataFieldsGraphics: (layout) ->
        for k of layout
            if layout[k] instanceof Array
                for o in layout[k]
                    for j of o
                        if j == "image" or j == "fullImage"
                            image = o[j]
                            
                            if image?.startsWith("data:")
                                ResourceManager.getBitmap(o[j])
                            else
                                ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{o[j]}")
                        
        return null
        
    ###*
    * Loads all graphics for the specified layout-descriptor.
    *
    * @method loadUiDataFieldsGraphics
    * @param {Object} layout - The layout descriptor.
    * @static
    ###     
    loadUiLayoutGraphics: (layout) ->
        if layout.preload?
            if layout.preload.graphics?
                for graphic in layout.preload.graphics
                    if graphic.name?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("#{graphic.folder||'Graphics/Pictures'}/#{ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(null, graphic.name)}")
                    else
                        object = ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(null, graphic.path)
                        for sub in object
                            if sub?
                                image = ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(sub, graphic.image)
                                if image?
                                    ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{image}")
            if layout.preload.videos?
                for video in layout.preload.videos
                    if video.name?
                        ResourceManager.getVideo("#{video.folder||'Movies'}/#{video.name}")
            if layout.preload.music?
                for music in layout.preload.music
                    if music?
                        ResourceManager.getVideo("#{music.folder||'Audio/Music'}/#{music.name || music}")
            if layout.preload.sounds?
                for sound in layout.preload.sounds
                    if sound?
                        ResourceManager.getAudioBuffer("#{sound.folder||'Audio/Sounds'}/#{ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(layout, sound.name || sound)}")
        if layout.images?
            for image in layout.images
                ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{image}")
        if layout.animations?
            for descriptor in layout.animations
                for animation in descriptor.flow
                    switch animation.type
                        when "sound"
                            ResourceManager.getAudioBuffer("Audio/Sounds/#{animation.sound}")
                        when "changeImages"
                            for image in animation.images
                                ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{image}")
                        when "maskTo"
                            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{animation.mask}")
                    if animation.sound?
                        ResourceManager.getAudioBuffer("Audio/Sounds/#{animation.sound}")
                        
        
        if layout.image?
            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{layout.image}")
        if layout.video?
            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Movies/#{layout.video}")
        if layout.customFields?
            @loadUiGraphicsFromObject(layout.customFields)
        if layout.customFields?.actions?
            for action in layout.customFields.actions
                if action.name == "playVoice" or action.name == "playSound"
                    AudioManager.loadSound(action.params.name)
        if layout.actions? or layout.action?
            actions = if layout.action? then [layout.action] else layout.actions
            for action in actions
                if action.name == "playVoice" or action.name == "playSound"
                    AudioManager.loadSound(action.params.name)
        if layout.params
            @loadUiLayoutGraphics(layout.params)
        if layout.template?
            @loadUiLayoutGraphics(layout.template)
        if layout.style? and ui.UiFactory.styles[layout.style]?
            @loadUiLayoutGraphics(ui.UiFactory.styles[layout.style])
            for sel of ui.UIManager.selectors
                style = ui.UIManager.styles[layout.style + ":"+sel]
                if style then @loadUiLayoutGraphics(style)
        if ui.UiFactory.customTypes[layout.type]?
            @loadUiLayoutGraphics(ui.UiFactory.customTypes[layout.type])
        if layout.controls?
            for control in layout.controls
                @loadUiLayoutGraphics(control)
    
    ###*
    * Loads all system sounds.
    *
    * @method loadSystemSounds
    * @static
    ###                
    loadSystemSounds: ->
        for sound in RecordManager.system.sounds
            AudioManager.loadSound(sound)
     
    ###*
    * Loads all system graphics.
    *
    * @method loadSystemGraphics
    * @static
    ###     
    loadSystemGraphics: ->
        for slot in GameManager.saveGameSlots
            if slot.thumb? and slot.thumb.length > 0
                ResourceManager.getBitmap(slot.thumb)
        if RecordManager.system.cursor?.name
            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{RecordManager.system.cursor.name}")
        if RecordManager.system.titleScreen?.name
            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{RecordManager.system.titleScreen.name}")
        if RecordManager.system.languageScreen?.name
            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{RecordManager.system.languageScreen.name}")
        if RecordManager.system.menuBackground?.name
            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{RecordManager.system.menuBackground.name}")
        return null
    
    ###*
    * Loads all resources needed by the specified list of commands.
    *
    * @method loadEventCommandsGraphics
    * @param {Object[]} commands - The list of commands.
    * @return {boolean} Indicates if data needs to be loaded. 
    * @static
    ### 
    loadEventCommandsData: (commands) ->
        @loadedScenesByUid = {}
        return @_loadEventCommandsData(commands)
        
    _loadEventCommandsData: (commands) ->
        return no if not commands?
        
        result = no
        
        for command in commands
            switch command.id
                when "vn.Choice"
                    if command.params.action.scene
                        sceneDocument = DataManager.getDocument(command.params.action.scene.uid)
                        if sceneDocument
                            result = !sceneDocument.loaded if !result
                            if sceneDocument.loaded and !@loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid]
                                @loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid] = yes
                                result = @_loadEventCommandsData(sceneDocument.items.commands) if !result
                        
                when "vn.CallScene"
                    if command.params.scene
                        sceneDocument = DataManager.getDocument(command.params.scene.uid)
                        if sceneDocument
                            result = !sceneDocument.loaded if !result
                            if sceneDocument.loaded and !@loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid]
                                @loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid] = yes
                                result = @_loadEventCommandsData(sceneDocument.items.commands) if !result
        
        return result  
        
    ###*
    * Loads all resources needed by the specified list of commands.
    *
    * @method loadEventCommandsGraphics
    * @param {Object[]} commands - The list of commands.
    * @static
    ###     
    loadEventCommandsGraphics: (commands) ->
        @loadedScenesByUid = {}
        @loadedCommonEventsById = []
        @_loadEventCommandsGraphics(commands)
        
    _loadEventCommandsGraphics: (commands) ->
        return if not commands?
        
        for command in commands
            switch command.id
                when "gs.CallCommonEvent"
                    commonEvent = RecordManager.commonEvents[command.params.commonEventId]
                    if commonEvent?
                        for param, i in commonEvent.parameters
                            if param.stringValueType == "sceneId" and command.params.parameters?.values[i]
                                sceneDocument = DataManager.getDocument(command.params.parameters.values[i])
                                if sceneDocument and !@loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid]
                                    @loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid] = yes
                                    @_loadEventCommandsGraphics(sceneDocument.items.commands)
                        if !@loadedCommonEventsById[command.params.commonEventId]
                            @loadedCommonEventsById[command.params.commonEventId] = true
                            @_loadEventCommandsGraphics(commonEvent.commands)
                when "vn.CallScene"
                    sceneDocument = DataManager.getDocument(command.params.scene.uid)
                    if sceneDocument and !@loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid]
                        @loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid] = yes
                        @_loadEventCommandsGraphics(sceneDocument.items.commands)
                when "gs.ChangeTransition"
                    ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{command.params.graphic?.name}")
                when "gs.ScreenTransition"
                    ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{command.params.graphic?.name}")
                when "vn.ChangeBackground"
                    if command.params.graphic?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Backgrounds/#{command.params.graphic.name}")
                    if command.params.animation?.type == gs.AnimationTypes.MASKING and command.params.animation.mask?.graphic
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{command.params.animation.mask.graphic.name}")
                when "vn.L2DJoinScene"
                    if command.params.model?
                        ResourceManager.getLive2DModel("Live2D/#{command.params.model.name}")
                when "vn.CharacterJoinScene"
                    character = RecordManager.characters[command.params.characterId]
                    if character?
                        expressionId = command.params.expressionId ? character.defaultExpressionId
                        if expressionId?
                            record = RecordManager.characterExpressions[expressionId]
                            if record?
                                if record.idle
                                    for image in record.idle
                                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{image.resource.name}")
                                if record.talking
                                    for image in record.talking
                                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{image.resource.name}")
                                        
                    if command.params.animation.type == gs.AnimationTypes.MASKING and command.params.animation.mask.graphic?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{command.params.animation.mask.graphic.name}")
                when "vn.CharacterChangeExpression"
                    record = RecordManager.characterExpressions[command.params.expressionId]
                    if record?
                        for image in record.idle
                            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{image.resource.name}")
                        for image in record.talking
                            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{image.resource.name}")
                    if command.params.animation.type == gs.AnimationTypes.MASKING and command.params.animation.mask.graphic?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{command.params.animation.mask.graphic.name}")        
                when "gs.ShowPartialMessage"
                    if command.params.voice?
                        AudioManager.loadSound(command.params.voice)
                        #ResourceManager.getAudioBuffer("Audio/Sound/#{command.params.voice.name}")
                 
                when "vn.Choice"
                    if command.params.action.scene
                        sceneDocument = DataManager.getDocument(command.params.action.scene.uid)
                        if sceneDocument and !@loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid]
                            @loadedScenesByUid[sceneDocument.uid] = yes
                            @_loadEventCommandsGraphics(sceneDocument.items.commands)
                        
                when "gs.ShowMessage", "gs.ShowMessageNVL", "gs.ShowText"
                    if command.params.animations?
                        for eid in command.params.animations
                            animation = RecordManager.animations[eid]
                            if animation? and animation.graphic.name
                                ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{animation.graphic.name}")
                                
                    if command.params.expressions?
                        for eid in command.params.expressions
                            expression = RecordManager.characterExpressions[eid]
                            if expression?
                                if expression.idle then for image in expression.idle
                                    ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{image.resource.name}")
                                if expression.talking then for image in expression.talking
                                    ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{image.resource.name}")
                                    
                    
                    if command.params.voice?
                        AudioManager.loadSound(command.params.voice)
                        #ResourceManager.getAudioBuffer("Audio/Sound/#{command.params.voice.name}")
                    record = RecordManager.characterExpressions[command.params.expressionId]
                    if record?
                        if record.idle then for image in record.idle
                            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{image.resource.name}")
                        if record.talking then for image in record.talking
                            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{image.resource.name}")
                        
    
                when "gs.AddHotspot"
                    if command.params.baseGraphic? and command.params.baseGraphic.name?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.baseGraphic.name}")
                    if command.params.hoverGraphic? and command.params.hoverGraphic.name?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.hoverGraphic.name}")
                    if command.params.selectedGraphic? and command.params.selectedGraphic.name?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.selectedGraphic.name}")
                    if command.params.selectedHoverGraphic? and command.params.selectedHoverGraphic.name?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.selectedHoverGraphic.name}")
                    if command.params.unselectedGraphic? and command.params.unselectedGraphic.name?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.unselectedGraphic.name}")
                when "gs.ShowPicture"
                    if command.params.graphic?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.graphic.name}")
                    if command.params.animation?.type == gs.AnimationTypes.MASKING
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{command.params.animation.mask.graphic.name}")
                when "gs.ShowImageMap"
                    if command.params.ground?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.ground.name}")
                    if command.params.hover?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.hover.name}")
                    if command.params.unselected?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.unselected.name}")
                    if command.params.selected?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.selected.name}")
                    if command.params.selectedHover?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.selectedHover.name}")
                    for hotspot in command.params.hotspots
                        if hotspot.data.action == 2 # Common Event
                            commonEvent = RecordManager.commonEvents[hotspot.data.commonEventId]
                            if commonEvent? and !@loadedCommonEventsById[hotspot.data.commonEventId]
                                @loadedCommonEventsById[hotspot.data.commonEventId] = true
                                @_loadEventCommandsGraphics(commonEvent.commands)
                when "gs.MovePicturePath", "vn.MoveCharacterPath", "vn.ScrollBackgroundPath", "gs.MoveVideoPath"   
                    if command.params.path.effects?
                        for effect in command.params.path.effects.data
                            AudioManager.loadSound(effect.sound)
                            
                when "gs.MaskPicture", "vn.MaskCharacter", "vn.MaskBackground", "gs.MaskVideo"
                    if command.params.mask.sourceType == 0 and command.params.mask.graphic?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{command.params.mask.graphic.name}")
                    if command.params.mask.sourceType == 1 and command.params.mask.video?
                        ResourceManager.getVideo("Movies/#{command.params.mask.video.name}")
                when "gs.PlayPictureAnimation"
                    animationId = command.params.animationId
                    if animationId? and not animationId.scope?
                            animation = RecordManager.animations[animationId]
                            if animation and animation.graphic
                                ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{animation.graphic.name}")
                
                when "gs.ShowBattleAnimation"
                    animationId = command.params.animationId
                    if animationId? and not animationId.scope?
                        animation = RecordManager.animations[animationId]
                        @loadComplexAnimation(animation)
                        
                when "gs.InputName"
                    actorId = command.params.actorId
                    if actorId? and not actorId.scope?
                        actor = RecordManager.actors[actorId]
                        if actor?
                            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Faces/#{actor.faceGraphic?.name}")
                    
                when "gs.ChangeTileset"
                    if command.params.graphic?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Tilesets/#{command.params.graphic.name}")
                when "gs.ChangeMapParallaxBackground"
                    if command.params.parallaxBackground?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.parallaxBackground.name}")
                when "gs.ChangeActorGraphic"
                    if command.params.changeCharacter and command.params.characterGraphic?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{command.params.characterGraphic.name}")
                    if command.params.changeFace and command.params.faceGraphic?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Faces/#{command.params.faceGraphic.name}")
                when "gs.MoveEvent"
                    for moveCommand in command.params.commands
                        switch moveCommand.id
                            when 44 # Change Graphic
                                ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Characters/#{moveCommand.resource.name}")
                            when 47 # Play Sound
                                AudioManager.loadSound(moveCommand.resource)
                when "gs.TransformEnemy"
                    if not command.params?.targetId.scope? # FIXME: Maybe just use the current variable value?
                        enemy = RecordManager.enemies[command.params.targetId]
                        @loadActorBattleAnimations(enemy)
                            
                when "gs.PlayMusic"
                    if command.params.music?
                        AudioManager.loadMusic(command.params.music)
                when "gs.PlayVideo", "gs.ShowVideo"
                    if command.params.video?
                        ResourceManager.getVideo("Movies/#{command.params.video.name}")
                    if command.params.animation?.type == gs.AnimationTypes.MASKING
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{command.params.animation.mask.graphic.name}")
                when "gs.PlaySound"
                    if command.params.sound?
                        AudioManager.loadSound(command.params.sound)
                        ResourceManager.getAudioBuffer("Audio/Sound/#{command.params.sound.name}")
                        
                when "vn.ChangeSounds"
                    for sound in command.params.sounds
                        if sound?
                            AudioManager.loadSound(sound)
                            
                when "gs.ChangeScreenCursor"
                    if command.params.graphic?.name?
                        ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Pictures/#{command.params.graphic.name}")
        return null
  
    ###*
    * Loads all resources for the specified animation.
    *
    * @method loadAnimation
    * @param {Object} animation - The animation-record.
    * @static
    ### 
    loadAnimation: (animation) ->
        if animation? and animation.graphic?
            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/SimpleAnimations/#{animation.graphic.name}")
            
    

gs.ResourceLoader = new ResourceLoader()        
window.ResourceLoader = gs.ResourceLoader
